decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of five years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building.  REASON:	To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with Unitary Development Plan (UDP) Adopted Policies B1, ES6, Replacement UDP Policy 4.11. | The proposed windows in the rear elevation of the building facing no.2 Balfour Road, shall be fixed and obscure glazed and permanently retained as such.  REASON:   To protect the the living conditions of residents at no. 2 Balfour Road, in accordance with Unitary Development Plan (UDP) Adopted Policies B1, B5, Replacement UDP Policy 4.1. | The approved outbuilding shall only be used for storage use ancillary to the authorised use of no.10 Sussex Road and for no other purposes.  REASON:   To enable the Local Planning Authority to maintain strict control over the nature of the use, to protect the living conditions of occupiers in the area, in accordance with Unitary Development Plan (UDP) Adopted Policies B1, B5, Replacement UDP Policy 4.1. | No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.  REASON:  To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties.
description: Single storey detached outbuilding (storeroom) in rear yard of shop
